description: The user asks for a slide that showcases media coverage with outlet logos and short excerpts. The assistant clarifies the startup name and desired outlets, performs live web searches to collect recent press mentions, extracts logo URLs and article snippets, then uses the create_slide_deck tool to generate a modern PPTX deck containing one slide per outlet. The generated deck is returned to the user as a downloadable base64‑encoded file.
